description.value:
Trigger Two or more creatures enter the area

Effect Fragments of Mirida's scattered thoughts and memories manifest in the room as flower petals, the sounds of weeping, whimpers of pain, and shrieks echo through the area, dealing @Damage[(2d10+13)[mental]|options:area-damage] damage to all intelligent creatures in the area (@Check[will|dc:32|basic] save). The haunt then rolls initiative.

details.description: A flurry of scattered flower petals flies through the area, as psychic impressions of pain, sorrow, and being trapped assail the livingâ€”Mirida's scattered memories.
details.disable: @Check[occultism|dc:31] or @Check[religion|dc:31] (expert) to weaken the haunt, @Check[deception|dc:29] or @Check[diplomacy|dc:29] (expert) to soothe the haunt's sorrow; three total successes in any combination are required to disable the haunt.

publication.title: Pathfinder #215: To Blot Out the Sun

details.reset: The petals disperse after 1 minute and reset after 1 day.
details.routine: (1 action) The flower petals surge through the room, dealing @Damage[(2d10+13)[slashing]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in the area (@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic] save). A creature that fails is additionally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 4} on a critical failure).
